definitions.definition: Excrement or clay used as a bonding material in construction.
A soft coating of mud, plaster etc.
To apply (something) to a surface in hasty or crude strokes.
definitions.example: The artist just seemed to daub on paint at random and suddenly there was a painting.

definitions.definition: To paint (a picture, etc.) in a coarse or unskilful manner.
To cover with a specious or deceitful exterior; to disguise; to conceal.
To put on without taste; to deck gaudily.
